snippet: Klara Liden’s “Pretty Vacant” at Reena Spaulings Fine Art creates a quasi-secret space out of 80 used Christmas trees.
abstract: Ken Johnson reviews installations by Klara Liden at Reena Spaulings gallery.
lead_paragraph: Klara Liden’s “Pretty Vacant” at Reena Spaulings Fine Art creates a quasi-secret space out of 80 used Christmas trees.

headline.main: Klara Liden’s ‘Pretty Vacant’ at Reena Spaulings Fine Art
